Package Shapes

Class Shapes

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes.Shapes
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Line, Plot, Polygon, Rectangle
    public abstract class Shapes
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class Shapes which is a generic class for the different shape objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • toVecFormat

        public abstract java.lang.String toVecFormat()
        Returns the vec file command for drawing the shape object. This contains all vertices/points, type/command for shape and color for fill and pen if specified.
        Returns:
        String

      • toString

        public abstract java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string object to describe the shape.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String

      • draw

        public abstract void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                          int imageSize)
        Method for drawing the shape object on the canvas. Customized for different shape object
        Parameters:
        g - A graphic object used for drawing
        imageSize - The size of the image to be drawn at

      • resize

        public abstract void resize​(double x2,
                            double y2)
        Resizes the shape object. Used when user is drawing (click and drag) on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        x2 - new x value
        y2 - ney y value

      • addPoint

        public abstract boolean addPoint​(double x2,
                                 double y2)
        Used only for polygon... Used to change the number of vertices. The benefit of implementing it as an abstract method is to use polymorphism when drawing from user at the canvas.
        Parameters:
        x2 - x value in new point
        y2 - y value in new point
        Returns:
        if the point is the same as the starting point the polygon is closed and return true
